segments.text: What a mess in this kitchen; it's infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and no one's stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the sink onto the floor like an idiot forgot the plug.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate like nothing's wrong, standing in the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing everywhere, risking their necks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy's on a stool that's practically falling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's raiding the cookie jar like a thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping him, breaking all the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is what happens when adults don't pay attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor garden outside deserves better than this indoor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell at them to stop before something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR
